name: Task Schedular
short_description:
Task Scheduler uses Excel automation to bring to you a smooth, bug-reduced and efficient platform. Using this, Task Schedular was created, mainly using formulas and macros. With Task Schedular, you can basically create and easily and efficiently mange your tasks. Try this now, use it for a few days, and I am sure that you will feel a great difference in your lifestyle for the better.

For the recommended installer (.exe), please click the button to the right of the screen. If you directly require the Excel Files, in the Files section, click Excel Files and then Macro-Enabled or Disabled and then download and enjoy.

Tutorials will be made available ASAP at bit.ly/taskschedulartutorials .

Thanks. Have a great day!
summary: Manage your tasks easily and efficiently.
